TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReceiveMessageCallback

summary.span: 实现 和 活动收到服务消息时要执行的回调。

span.span: Implements a callback to be executed when a service message is received by the and activities.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现用于在收到消息时访问消息标头的 接口。The following example shows how to implement the interface to access a message header when a message is received. [!code-csharp[AccessingOperationContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/accessingoperationcontext/cs/receiveinstanceidcallback.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void OnReceiveMessage (System.ServiceModel.OperationContext operationContext, System.Activities.ExecutionProperties activityExecutionProperties);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnReceiveMessage(class System.ServiceModel.OperationContext operationContext, class System.Activities.ExecutionProperties activityExecutionProperties) cil managed

param.name: operationContext
param.span: 接收消息时所在的操作上下文。

span.span: The operation context under which the message received.

param.name: activityExecutionProperties
param.span: 工作流中可用的执行属性的集合。

span.span: The set of execution properties available within the workflow.
Executed when a service message is received.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现用于在收到消息时访问消息标头的 接口。The following example shows how to implement the interface to access a message header when a message is received.
